backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no exposed methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an H1 text update in HeaderSection.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing summaries of all frontend components and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining global OKLCH variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and setting the page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the PortfolioPage.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/AboutS: Renders the About section with a title underline and mapped bio paragraphs.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Articl: Reusable article card showing title, metadata, description, and link using Card and Badge components.
Displays article categories with section heading and a responsive grid of ArticleCard components.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Expert: Shows a grid of expertise items using Card components with left accent borders.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Footer: Footer with copyright, last updated date, and a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Header: Hero header with name 'ShiBhu', tagline, and expertise tag badges over a dark gradient.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Composes all portfolio sections including header, nav, content sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/StatsS: Grid of career statistics displayed in Card components.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Sticky: Sticky navigation bar providing smooth scrolling to key sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes plus global styles.
frontend/src/lib/portfolioContent.ts: Provides TypeScript interfaces and static content arrays for articles, categories, expertise tags, and stats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, OKLCH color mappings, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, and existing features for the portfolio site implementation.
